description:
Reentrancy in BasePoolFactory._create(bytes,bytes32) (contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#119-123):
	External calls:
	- pool = CREATE3.deploy(_computeFinalSalt(salt),abi.encodePacked(_creationCode,constructorArgs),0) (contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#120)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _registerPoolWithFactory(pool) (contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#122)
		- _isPoolFromFactory[pool] = true (contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#104)
	- _registerPoolWithFactory(pool) (contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#122)
		- _pools.push(pool) (contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#105)

		- [_isPoolFromFactory[pool] = true](contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#L104)
	- [_registerPoolWithFactory(pool)](contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#L122)
		- [_pools.push(pool)](contracts/BasePoolFactory.sol#L105)
